smarttrolleygui.slideshow

Class SlideShow

  • java.lang.Object
    • smarttrolleygui.slideshow.SlideShow

  • public class SlideShow
extends java.lang.Object
    SmartTrolley Instances of this object contain all elements in a slideshow, as described in the PWS
    Version:
    V1.0 [Date Created: 24 May 2014]
    Author:
    Prashant Chakravarty, Checked By: Alasdair 29 May 2014
